GPT-4.description: A large multimodal model, improved from GPT-3.5, capable of solving complex problems with advanced reasoning

GPT-3.5.description: Improves on GPT-3, proficient in understanding and generating natural language or code

GPT-3.description: The original model capable of understanding and generating natural language

DALL·E.description: Generates and edits images from natural language descriptions

Whisper.description: Speech recognition model that works across multiple languages

Embeddings.description: Converts text into numerical form for various applications

Codex.description: Understands and generates code, trained on vast open-source code

Moderation.description: Classifies content according to OpenAI’s usage policies

Gato.description: DeepMind's multimodal model, handling various data types, suitable for complex tasks requiring cross-modal understanding.

CLIP.description: Connects text and images, ideal for creative tasks and preliminary design works.

Mistral 7B.description: Efficient language model, suitable for generating large volumes of text or initial drafts.

Dolphin.description: Specialized in multimodal processing, perfect for projects requiring integration of text and image data.

Point-E.description: Generative model for producing 3D point cloud representations, useful in 3D modeling and visualization.

Whisper Open Source.description: Versatile for speech recognition tasks in multiple languages, suitable for transcription and translation.

Jukebox.description: Creates music and audio, ideal for artistic and entertainment purposes.
